mil3.3.6:1.4_0: “Yo, bhante, abbhantare jīvo cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena
mil3.3.6:1.4_1: gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, manasā dhammaṁ
mil3.3.6:1.4_2: vijānāti, yathā mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā yena yena vātapānena iccheyyāma passituṁ,
mil3.3.6:1.4_3: tena tena vātapānena passeyyāma, puratthimenapi vātapānena passeyyāma, pacchimenapi
mil3.3.6:1.4_4: vātapānena passeyyāma, uttarenapi vātapānena passeyyāma, dakkhiṇenapi vātapānena passeyyāma.
mil3.3.6:1.5: Evameva kho, bhante, ayaṁ abbhantare jīvo yena yena dvārena icchati passituṁ, tena tena dvārena passatī”ti.
mil3.3.6:2.2_0: “pañcadvāraṁ, mahārāja, bhaṇissāmi, taṁ suṇohi, sādhukaṁ manasikarohi, yadi abbhantare
mil3.3.6:2.2_1: jīvo cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, yathā mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā yena yena vātapānena
mil3.3.6:2.2_2: iccheyyāma passituṁ, tena tena vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, puratthimenapi vātapānena
mil3.3.6:2.2_3: rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, pacchimenapi vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, uttarenapi vātapānena
mil3.3.6:2.2_4: rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, dakkhiṇenapi vātapānena rūpaṁyeva passeyyāma, evametena abbhantare
mil3.3.6:2.2_5: jīvena sotenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, ghānenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi
mil3.3.6:2.2_6: rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, kāyenapi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ, manasāpi rūpaṁyeva passitabbaṁ;
mil3.3.6:2.3: cakkhunāpi saddoyeva sotabbo, ghānenapi saddoyeva sotabbo, jivhāyapi saddoyeva sotabbo, kāyenapi saddoyeva sotabbo, manasāpi saddoyeva sotabbo;
mil3.3.6:2.4: cakkhunāpi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, sotenapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, jivhāyapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, kāyenapi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo, manasāpi gandhoyeva ghāyitabbo;
mil3.3.6:2.5: cakkhunāpi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, sotenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, ghānenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, kāyenapi rasoyeva sāyitabbo, manasāpi rasoyeva sāyitabbo;
mil3.3.6:2.6_0: cakkhunāpi phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ, sotenapi phoṭṭhabbaṁ yeva phusitabbaṁ, ghānenapi
mil3.3.6:2.6_1: phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi phoṭṭhabbaṁ yeva phusitabbaṁ, manasāpi phoṭṭhabbaṁyeva phusitabbaṁ;
mil3.3.6:2.7_0: cakkhunāpi dhammaṁ yeva vijānitabbaṁ, sotenapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabbaṁ, ghānenapi
mil3.3.6:2.7_1: dhammaṁ yeva vijānitabbaṁ, jivhāyapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabbaṁ, kāyenapi dhammaṁyeva vijānitabban”ti?
mil3.3.6:3.1_0: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā
mil3.3.6:3.1_1: vā pana, mahārāja, mayaṁ idha pāsāde nisinnā imesu jālavātapānesu ugghāṭitesu mahantena
mil3.3.6:3.1_2: ākāsena bahimukhā suṭṭhutaraṁ rūpaṁ passāma, evametena abbhantare jīvenāpi cakkhudvāresu
mil3.3.6:3.1_3: ugghāṭitesu mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutaraṁ rūpaṁ passitabbaṁ, sotesu ugghāṭitesu …
mil3.3.6:3.1_4: ghāne ugghāṭite … jivhāya ugghāṭitāya … kāye ugghāṭite mahantena ākāsena suṭṭhutaraṁ
mil3.3.6:3.1_5: saddo sotabbo, gandho ghāyitabbo, raso sāyitabbo, phoṭṭhabbo phusitabbo”ti?
mil3.3.6:4.1_0: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā
mil3.3.6:4.1_1: vā pana, mahārāja, ayaṁ dinno nikkhamitvā bahidvārakoṭṭhake tiṭṭheyya, jānāsi tvaṁ,
mil3.3.6:4.3: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, ayaṁ dinno anto pavisitvā tava purato tiṭṭheyya, jānāsi tvaṁ, mahārāja, ‘ayaṁ dinno anto pavisitvā mama purato ṭhito’”ti?
mil3.3.6:4.5: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, abbhantare so jīvo jivhāya rase nikkhitte jāneyya ambilattaṁ vā lavaṇattaṁ vā tittakattaṁ vā kaṭukattaṁ vā kasāyattaṁ vā madhurattaṁ vā”ti?
mil3.3.6:4.7: “Te rase anto paviṭṭhe jāneyya ambilattaṁ vā lavaṇattaṁ vā tittakattaṁ vā kaṭukattaṁ vā kasāyattaṁ vā madhurattaṁ vā”ti.
mil3.3.6:5.1_0: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā purimaṁ, yathā,
mil3.3.6:5.1_1: mahārāja, kocideva puriso madhughaṭasataṁ āharāpetvā madhudoṇiṁ pūrāpetvā purisassa
mil3.3.6:5.1_2: mukhaṁ pidahitvā madhudoṇiyā pakkhipeyya, jāneyya, mahārāja, so puriso madhuṁ sampannaṁ
mil3.3.6:5.4: “Na hi tassa, bhante, mukhe madhu paviṭṭhan”ti.
mil3.3.6:6.1: “Na kho te, mahārāja, yujjati purimena vā pacchimaṁ, pacchimena vā puriman”ti.
mil3.3.6:7.1: Thero abhidhammasaṁyuttāya kathāya rājānaṁ milindaṁ saññāpesi—
mil3.3.6:7.2_0: “idha, mahārāja, cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, taṁsahajātā
mil3.3.6:7.2_1: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṁ manasikāroti evamete dhammā paccayato
mil3.3.6:7.2_2: jāyanti, na hettha vedagū upalabbhati, sotañca paṭicca sadde ca …pe…
mil3.3.6:7.3_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, taṁsahajātā phasso vedanā saññā
mil3.3.6:7.3_1: cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṁ manasikāroti evamete dhammā paccayato jāyanti, na hettha
